update stat_lr
hour = #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=TINYINT},
publisher_id = #{publisherId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pub_app_id = #{pubAppId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
placement_id = #{placementId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

abt = #{abt,jdbcType=TINYINT},

waterfall_filled = #{waterfallFilled,jdbcType=INTEGER},

bid = #{bid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and day = #{day,jdbcType=DATE}

update stat_lr set hour = #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=TINYINT}, publisher_id = #{publisherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pub_app_id = #{pubAppId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, placement_id = #{placementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adn_id = #{adnId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, abt = #{abt,jdbcType=TINYINT}, waterfall_request = #{waterfallRequest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, waterfall_filled = #{waterfallFilled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, instance_request = #{instanceRequest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, instance_filled = #{instanceFilled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_start = #{videoStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_complete = #{videoComplete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, called_show = #{calledShow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_ready_true = #{isReadyTrue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_ready_false = #{isReadyFalse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, click = #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER}, impr = #{impr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bid_req = #{bidReq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid_resp = #{bidResp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid_resp_price = #{bidRespPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bid_win = #{bidWin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bid_win_price = #{bidWinPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bid = #{bid,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and day = #{day,jdbcType=DATE}
mapper.select:
select
day,
publisher_id,
pub_app_id,
platform,
country,
placement_id,
instance_id,
scene_id,
case when bid = 0 then adn_id else -1 end as adn_id,
adn_id,
abt,
hour,
bid,
sum(waterfall_request) as waterfall_request,sum(waterfall_filled) as waterfall_filled, sum(instance_request + bid_req) as instance_request, sum(instance_filled + bid_resp) as instance_filled, sum(video_start) as video_start,sum(video_complete) as video_complete,sum(called_show) as called_show, sum(is_ready_true) as is_ready_true,sum(is_ready_false) as is_ready_false, sum(click) as click,sum(impr) as impr, sum(click) as mediation_click, sum(impr) as mediation_impr, sum(bid_req) as bid_req, sum(bid_resp) as bid_resp, sum(bid_resp_price) as bid_resp_price, sum(bid_win) as bid_win, sum(bid_win_price) as bid_win_price from stat_lr
group by
day,
publisher_id,
pub_app_id,
platform,
country,
placement_id,
instance_id,
scene_id,
case when bid = 0 then adn_id else -1 end,
adn_id,
abt,
hour,
bid,
null
order by #{orderByClause}
